Paragraph: There is still a room to lower the LUMO level of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) from 3.63 to ∼ 4.0 eV , which is ∼ 0.3 eV higher than the LUMO level of PCBM.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value          |
|-----------------------|

| LUMO level of PCBM |  |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

|-----------------------|

Note: The paragraph only mentions the "LUMO level" of PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM, so only those entities are included in the table. Other entities such as "there is still a room to lower", "which is", and "∼ 0.3 eV higher" do not clearly refer to material properties and are not included.
